creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red and black with long, braided fringe both ends, ending with dyed wool and animal hair-wrapped tassels; heavy; coarse; woven in twill patterns; warp faced; Hepworth #193 sewn near one end
dimension:
95 3/4 x 3 1/8 in. (243.21 x 7.92 cm) (without fringe)
9 in. (22.86 cm) (fringe)
1 3/4 in. (4.45 cm) (object part, wrapped tassels)
title: Woman's Belt
